Solvers

Class Solver

  • java.lang.Object
    • Coordinator.Processor
      • Solvers.Solver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Resolution, Walker

    public abstract class Solver
extends Processor
    This is the superclass of all taskSupplier classes. Created by ohlbach on 09.10.2018.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected CentralProcessor centralProcessor
      all solvers can report intermediate results to the centralProcess, and observe new results there.
      protected java.util.function.Consumer<int[]> equivalenceObserverBoth
      This observer is called when a new equivalence class is derived in the implicationDAG It inserts Equivalence tasks locally and in the centralProcessor's task queue.
      protected java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> implicationObserverBoth
      This observer is called when a new implication is inserted into the implicationDAG It inserts BinaryClause tasks locally and in the centralProcessor's task queue.
      protected java.util.function.Consumer<CLiteral> literalRemovalObserverBoth
      This observer is called when a literal is removed from a clause.
      static java.lang.String[] solvers
      the list of all taskSupplier types
      protected java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Integer> trueLiteralObserverToCentral
      This observer is called when a literal has become true.

        applicationParameters, basicClauseList, clauses, disjointnesses, equivalenceMonitor, equivalenceObserver, equivalences, globalParameters, id, implicationDAG, implicationMonitor, implicationObserver, literalRemovalMonitor, longClauseObserver, model, monitor, monitoring, predicates, problemId, purityObserver, satisfiabilityObserver, statistics, supervisor, taskQueue, trueLiteralMonitorDAG, trueLiteralMonitorDIS, trueLiteralMonitorEQV, trueLiteralObserver, unsatisfiabilityMonitorDIS, unsatisfiabilityMonitorEQV, unsatisfiabilityObserver

    • Field Detail

      • solvers

        public static java.lang.String[] solvers
        the list of all taskSupplier types

      • centralProcessor

        protected CentralProcessor centralProcessor
        all solvers can report intermediate results to the centralProcess, and observe new results there.

      • trueLiteralObserverToCentral

        protected java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Integer> trueLiteralObserverToCentral
        This observer is called when a literal has become true. It inserts a TrueLiteral task into centralProcessor's task queue.

      • implicationObserverBoth

        protected java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> implicationObserverBoth
        This observer is called when a new implication is inserted into the implicationDAG It inserts BinaryClause tasks locally and in the centralProcessor's task queue.

      • equivalenceObserverBoth

        protected java.util.function.Consumer<int[]> equivalenceObserverBoth
        This observer is called when a new equivalence class is derived in the implicationDAG It inserts Equivalence tasks locally and in the centralProcessor's task queue.

      • literalRemovalObserverBoth

        protected java.util.function.Consumer<CLiteral> literalRemovalObserverBoth
        This observer is called when a literal is removed from a clause. It inserts a task locally and a LiteralRemoval task in the centralProcessor's task queue.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Solver

        public Solver(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> solverControl,
              GlobalParameters globalParameters,
              CentralProcessor centralProcessor)
        constructs a taskSupplier as an instance of the Processor class.
        Parameters:
        solverControl - the control parameters for the taskSupplier
        globalParameters - the global control parameters
        centralProcessor - the central processor.

    • Method Detail

      • isSolver

        public static boolean isSolver(java.lang.String name)
        checks if the name is a taskSupplier name
        Parameters:
        name - a string
        Returns:
        true if the name is the name of a taskSupplier.

      • solverClass

        public static java.lang.Class solverClass(java.lang.String name)
        maps the taskSupplier names to the taskSupplier classes. This method must be extended when a new taskSupplier class is added.
        Parameters:
        name - a taskSupplier name
        Returns:
        the taskSupplier class, or null

      • help

        public static java.lang.String help()
        collects all the help-strings for all taskSupplier classes
        Returns:
        the collected help string for all taskSupplier classes

      • help

        public static java.lang.String help(java.lang.String name)
        returns the help-string for the generator with the given name
        Parameters:
        name - a generator name
        Returns:
        its help-string

      • parseParameters

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> parseParameters(java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters,
                                                                                                        java.lang.StringBuffer errors,
                                                                                                        java.lang.StringBuffer warnings)
        parses the string-type parameters into sequences of objects
        Parameters:
        name - the generator name
        parameters - a key-value map with parameters as strings
        errors - for collecting error messages
        warnings - for collecting warning messages
        Returns:
        a list of key-value maps where the values are objects.

      • construct

        public static Solver construct(java.lang.String type,
                               java.lang.Integer id,
                               GlobalParameters globalParameters,
                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> solverParameters,
                               CentralProcessor centralProcessor)
        constructs a new taskSupplier of the given type
        Parameters:
        type - the taskSupplier type
        id - the id of the taskSupplier
        solverParameters - a key-value map with parameters as strings
        globalParameters - the global parameters
        centralProcessor - the central processor
        Returns:
        a new taskSupplier

      • addObservers

        protected void addObservers()
        This method adds observers to the local process and the centralProcessor. The centralProcessor is observed and may insert tasks in the local task queue

      • removeObservers

        protected void removeObservers()
        This method removes the observers from the centralProcessor. The local observer automatically become garbage at the end.

      • solve

        public abstract Result solve()
        The key method, which has to be implemented by the solvers. It is supposed to find a model or a contradiction in the clauses.
        Returns:
        Un/Satisfiable or null
